entry.title: Elevate 38 Sports Turf for Batting Cages (5mm Pad)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 2.69

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Elevate 38 sports turf with 5mm foam pad is made for batting cages and moderate traffic areas and continues to deliver a long term returns on investment at a moderate price point. It provides an excellent feel, durable 1/2" pile height and spring set yarn delivers traffic pattern resistance.

The foam backing offers additional padding and extends the life of the sports turf; as well as provides impact resistance for plyometric activities.

How to Order
  • Buy Pre-Cut Sizes online, Request a Quote for custom lengths, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Kodiak Elevate 38 rolls are 12' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot, but can be custom made in 15' with minimum order requirements.
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

     

    Please allow 2.5 weeks for delivery to most areas of the lower 48 states.

entry.title: Kodiak Pitching Pro Bullpen Pitching Bullpen/Practice Mound 516
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pitch Pro
Type: Platforms
Price: 1740.00

The Pitch Pro Bullpen Platform Model 516 is the #1 Choice for indoor sports facilities needing a pro level bullpen platform/mound.

The 516 Bullpen Platform is made of a complex construction, providing an extremely rigid surface with the highest quality game turf. This platform is extra wide and has plenty of room for windups with the large area around the rubber; pitcher will not come off of the mound after releasing the ball.

The 516 Mound can be used outside on your field...the platform is designed with tapered sides to allow air flow under the mounds to prevent the grass from dying out.

 **Color Option is for the platform ONLY, not the turf

  • Dimension:  54” x 126” x 10”
  • Weight: 125 lbs
  • Age: Any
  • Platform Color Options: Forest Green, Royal Blue, Black, Red and White

entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 0.00

Temporary fencing provides an easy solution for coaches and cities to build a home run fence for ball containment, a clean/professional look and official distance markers for game play.

The fence comes in 5' or 10' pole increments, in ground or above ground options.  The 5' increment is more popular to prevent sag in the net and additional strength in windy areas.

Warranty

Grand Slam Fencing products are warranted completely against manufacturing defects. Such defects include, but are
not limited to, incorrect size or mis-weaves in fence fabric. Manufacturing defects would be apparent before use or
shortly after Grand Slam Fencing is put in use and must be delineated to manufacturer at that time. Digital pictures
showing defect are required. Manufacturing defect claims for Grand Slam Fencing products with extended use may
be denied.
 
Upon verification of defect, manufacturer will either replace cover, repair to customer’s satisfaction or issue full or
partial credit.  

Manufacturer reserves the right to make the final judgment on the stated options.  
Warranty applies under the conditions of normal use, but does not apply to problems resulting from unreasonable
use, mishandling, negligence or intentional damage.  

ULTRA-VIOLET LIGHT BREAKDOWN
Grand Slam Fencing products are warranted to 2 years against fence fabric breakdown or pole degradation from the
ultra-violet (UV) sunlight. Warranty is pro-rated over two-year period. UV breakdown is evident through brittleness of
fencing or poles or greatly reduced strength.
Upon verification of defect, manufacturer, will either credit customer, repair cover to customer’s satisfaction, or replace.

Manufacturer reserves the right to make final judgment on the stated options.

Freight charges for replacement of cover are not included under warranty.

WIND DAMAGE
Damage due to wind force may be denied under warranty.  It is the responsibility of the user to take down Grand
Slam Fencing during periods of high wind.  
Report defects in writing to Kodiak Sports, LLC at sales@kodiaksports.com. Please include proof of purchase/sales order reference.

entry.title: Batco Portable & Collapsible Batting Cage Frame & Net
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: batting cage
Price: 4299.99 - 4899.99 (6 variants)

The Batco portable batting cage is known for durability, function and portability; excellent inside of gymnasiums for temporary use.

The Batco portable batting cage uses four steel arch frames to maintain rigidity and shape with #42 gauge nylon netting for protection. Both materials are tough, weatherproof and easy to use. Two people can easily set up the batting cage in a couple of minutes and quickly put it away again, allowing maximum use of your practice time.

Buy your Batco portable batting cage at the lowest price around. Order today for fast delivery!
 
The steel arch frames are rugged but lightweight at 45 lbs each and create a truly portable cage that expands and contracts for storage in less than 5 minutes.  Tied off at the ends with built in web straps, the cage is free standing and self-supporting. 2 people can raise the arch frames off the floor and walk the frame together to close the cage up.
 

Product Highlights:

  • 54'Long cage has four arch frames, 72'L has five arch frames
  • #42 gauge knotless nylon netting
  • Portable and durable
  • Indoor or Outdoor Cage Feet available upon ordering
  • Cage performs very well in the wind, due to its shape and construction
  • Completely weatherproof construction
  • Light and easily manageable
  • Made in the USA
  • Strong, light steel frame
  • Batco 54' Portable Batting Cage
Portable batting cages are the best way to make the most of what you have. When time and space are finite, you need a fast way to make room for batting practice that doesn't put other players at risk. That's where the Batco 54' portable batting cage comes in. Two people can assemble this in under five minutes and put it away again in less. It's the ultimate tool for your game!

entry.title: Kodiak Model KS271 Pro Grade Wood Baseball Bat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 99.99

Kodiak Sports wood bats are made from the finest hard maple, ash and birch on the market.  The raw billets are sorted for color, straight grain, moisture content, balance and weight.  The billets that are not pro grade wood are sold off as trophy bats in bulk for corporate events, given away as promotion items or sold as a blemish bat for a heavy discount.

Bat Model Details:

The KS271 is modeled after the Louisville Slugger C271.  The 271 model is one of the most popular baseball bats of the last 20 years, used by sluggers like Ken Griffey Jr., Alex Rodriguez and many others.  The KS271 is also used by athletes from high school to college.  The bat is so well balanced is capable of performing well at almost any level.
 

Product Details:

  • Hard Maple, Birth, Or Ash
  • Pro Grade Stock
  • Beautiful Finish
  • Famous Laser Engraved Kodiak Bear Logo
  • Straight Grain
  • CNC cut for Precision
  • Consistent Model Sizes
  • Choice of Bat Weight
  • 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed
Warranty:
If you are unsatisfied with your Kodiak Wood Bat for any reason, ship it back, broken or not and we will return the full price of your bat.  All you pay is the shipping costs.  That's how confident we are that you will love our bats...just like everyone else does.
